Our ESG Journey: Integrating ESG into Core Business Functions
Keep Looking Ahead
KLA’s Keep Looking Ahead™ vision reflects our optimistic view of the 
positive impact technology can have on the world. We recognize that while 
we are proud to highlight and celebrate our 2021 ESG achievements, we need to challenge ourselves and commit to ongoing progress. That’s why 
we have included Keep Looking Ahead sections throughout the report to 
provide an overview of what’s on the horizon in 2022 and beyond.
